text:
Company: Fox Inc  
Role: Senior Accountant  

Company Background:  
Fox Inc is a leading multinational corporation specializing in innovative technology solutions. We pride ourselves on our diverse and inclusive work environment that fosters creativity and collaboration.

Job Type: Full-time  

Job Description:  
Fox Inc is seeking a Senior Accountant to join our dynamic finance team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing financial records, ensuring regulatory compliance, and supporting strategic financial planning. We welcome applications from all, especially those with disabilities, to enhance our workforce.  

Responsibilities:  
- Prepare and analyze financial statements in accordance with GAAP  
- Manage month-end and year-end close processes  
- Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal government reporting requirements  
- Provide financial insights to support business decisions  
- Coordinate with internal and external auditors  
- Oversee accounts payable/receivable  

Qualifications and Experience Needed:  
- Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field  
- CPA certification preferred  
- Minimum of 5 years of experience in accounting or finance  
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills  
- Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Office Suite  
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  

Perks and Benefits:  
- Highly competitive salary ranging from $80,000 to $120,000, based on experience and skills  
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance  
- Generous paid time off, including parental leave  
- Retirement savings plan with company match  
- Professional development opportunities  
- Flexible working hours and remote work options  

Join Fox Inc in promoting diversity – we encourage applications from those with disabilities.
